alert.note: Alert for Cocke (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 8:29PM CDT until May 28 at 6:42AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee... Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pigeon River at Newport TN. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs downstream from gage on Highway 25/70 and in the community of Edwina. Jimtown Road may be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM EDT Friday was 12.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 3.8 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.3 feet on 10/24/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 745 AM EDT.
